name: Hot Wheels Pinball
description:
*HOT WHEELS PINBALL is a easy access web,3D pinball game where you can enjoy "tilt" experience with "crazy" Hot Whells theme.

*Launch the ball, and hold the ball on track!

*Don't make it fall! Use the arrow keys to take control!

*Easy?

*Use the ramps, hit the bumpers and trigger horns to complete missions and score most!

*Avoid hitting the Hot Wheels car drifting on the track not to lose control!
